events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but the shipment still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated.
The issue was classified as a Delivery Delay based on customer message referencing shipment and tracking problems.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for further assistance regarding the delayed delivery.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm Sarah and I'll help you with the status of your delayed shipment.
Could you please provide your order number so I can check the shipping status and tracking details for you?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I’ve been checking the tracking but it hasn’t updated for over a week now.
I have contacted the shipping provider regarding your order 987654321 and they confirmed there is a delay. We expect delivery within the next 3 business days.
Thanks for the update, I appreciate you looking into this. I’ll wait a few more days and see if the package arrives.
We have confirmed your shipment has now been dispatched from the local hub and should arrive shortly. Please contact us if it doesn’t.
Just checking in to ensure your order arrived as expected. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you haven’t reported further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
